cfbscrapR 0.1.4
  • Vignettes
  • Functions
  • News

Get information from games

cfb_game_info.Rd

1 - Game info for all games that year 2 - Game infos for a specific week of games in a year 3 - Game info for one team that year (or a specific week) 4 - Game info for specific conference that year (or a specific week)

cfb_game_info(
  year,
  season_type = "regular",
  week = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL
)

Arguments

year

Year
season_type

Select Season Type (regular,postseason,both)
week

Week (optional, keep this numeric)
team

Team (optional, D1 Team)
conference

Conference (option, select an appropriate conference)

Examples


cfb_game_info(2018,week=1)
#>           id season week season_type               start_date start_time_tbd
